    • Method Detail

      • act

        public abstract Types.ACTIONS act(StateObservation stateObs,
                                  ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedTimer)
        Picks an action. This function is called every game step to request an action from the player. The action returned must be contained in the actions accessible from stateObs.getAvailableActions(), or no action will be applied. Single Player method.
        Parameters:
        stateObs - Observation of the current state.
        elapsedTimer - Timer when the action returned is due.
        Returns:
        An action for the current state

      • act

        public abstract Types.ACTIONS act(StateObservationMulti stateObs,
                                  ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedTimer)
        Picks an action. This function is called every game step to request an action from the player. The action returned must be contained in the actions accessible from stateObs.getAvailableActions(), or no action will be applied. Multi player method.
        Parameters:
        stateObs - Observation of the current state.
        elapsedTimer - Timer when the action returned is due.
        Returns:
        An action for the current state

      • result

        public void result(StateObservation stateObs,
                   ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedCpuTimer)
        Function called when the game is over. This method must finish before CompetitionParameters.TEAR_DOWN_TIME, or the agent will be DISQUALIFIED
        Parameters:
        stateObs - the game state at the end of the game
        elapsedCpuTimer - timer when this method is meant to finish.

      • resultMulti

        public void resultMulti(StateObservationMulti stateObs,
                        ElapsedCpuTimer elapsedCpuTimer)

      • setup

        public void setup(java.lang.String actionFile,
                  int randomSeed,
                  boolean isHuman)
        This function sets up the controller to save the actions executed in a given game.
        Parameters:
        actionFile - file to save the actions to.
        randomSeed - Seed for the sampleRandom generator of the game to be played.
        isHuman - Indicates if the player is a human or not.

      • teardown

        public final void teardown(Game played)
        Closes the agent, writing actions to file.

        Logs a single action
        Parameters:
        action - the action to log.

        Gets the last action executed by this controller.

        the last action

      • isHuman

        public boolean isHuman()
        Indicates if this player is human controlled.
        Returns:
        true if the player is human.

        Returns:

      • getAllActions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Types.ACTIONS> getAllActions()
        Get the history of actions of this player.
        Returns:
        arrayList of all actions

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Gets the player the control to draw something on the screen. It can be used for debug purposes.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics device to draw to.
